    • 方法详细资料

      • getCapability

        public <T> T getCapability(net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.Capability<T> capability,
                           net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side)
        从接口复制的说明: net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider
        Retrieves the handler for the capability requested on the specific side.
        • The return value CAN be null if the object does not support the capability.
        • The return value CAN be the same for multiple faces.

        Basically, this method functions analogously to Map.get(Object).

        指定者:
        getCapability 在接口中 net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider
        覆盖:
        getCapability 在类中 gregtech.api.metatileentity.MetaTileEntity
        参数:
        capability - The capability to check
        side - The Side to check from, CAN BE NULL. Null is defined to represent 'internal' or 'self'
        返回:
        The requested capability. Must NOT be null when ICapabilityProvider.hasCapability(Capability, EnumFacing) would return true.
